name: 性感的金发女郎
description:
Sexy Blonde is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This game will immerse you in the dizzying story of a man and a woman who love to have sex! Sexy blonde is waiting for her husband to suck his cock!!!
In this wonderful game you have to plunge into the story of a couple who loves to have sex. Blonde Sally loves to suck her husband's big dick. She loves to do it so much that instead of cooking, she is waiting for her husband to suck him off! And finally she waited for him! What happened next you will see in this game! Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music.
Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!
